AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Raymond McMillon: Defendant who allegedly transported aliens with Williams, identified by De La Cruz and Hernandez-Gomez as the person motioning for them to hide, argued against the conspiracy conviction and had his transportation convictions affirmed, seeking a reduction in offense level due to minimal or minor participation, denied a § 3B1.2 adjustment
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Zeba Williams: Individual allegedly transporting aliens with McMillon, part of the conspiracy, testified at sentencing that McMillon did not recruit her but they entered a joint partnership
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Raymond McMillon and Zeba Williams: Defendants who allegedly transported aliens together, subject of the conspiracy conviction, entered a joint partnership to smuggle aliens
